comments.raw_text:
[Affected versions]:
Firefox 65.0a1 
Firefox 64.0b5 
Firefox 63.0.1
Firefox 60.3.0esr 

[Affected platforms]:
Windows 10 64bit.

[Preconditions]:
Enable the "AppUpdateURL" policy via GPO and assign it the following URL: https://www.example.com/

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox.
2. Access the about:policies page.	

[Expected result]:
1: The policy is enabled (enabled via HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE)
2: An appropriate error message is displayed inside the about:policies#errors page (enabled via HKEY_CURRENT_USER)- since this is a computer level only policy.

[Actual result]:
1 and 2:The "Unknown policy: URL" error is displayed inside the about:policies#errors page.

[Note]
It seems that the valueName should be "AppUpdateURL" and not just "URL" -> https://github.com/mozilla/policy-templates/blob/master/windows/firefox.admx#L2181 (Thanks Felipe for pointing this out).
